attributes.action: After Covid 19 never allow the NHS to go under funded including wage increases
attributes.additional_details: To protect the NHS and ensure there is never again a case where private companies have to prop up the health service. Also to pay respect to our brave NHS workers and show them that the UK and parliament respect what they do for us and that the UK will never be in a position again where doctors and nurses have to fight for basic PPE or to decide who gets to live based purely on available resources or struggle to pay bills based on low incomes. The NHS needs to be the flagship healthcare service
attributes.background: After Covid 19 crisis has ended, never again allow the NHS to be under funded and to ensure NHS workers are recognised with increased wages. The UK must have the best health care service in the world and the individuals working in the NHS should have the best wages to match.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, calling for similar actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300925
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
